Job Description***Job Summary:***


We are seeking a skilled AI/Data Science Subject Matter Expert (SME) with a robust background in data engineering to join our content development team. Primarily, the candidate must have significant experience in training delivery and mentoring teams on these topics. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience with PySpark, Scala, Hadoop, and other big data technologies. This role involves creating, reviewing, and enhancing educational and technical content related to AI, data science, and data engineering.

***Key Responsibilities:***

* **Training:** Conduct regular training sessions and workshops for internal teams to enhance their skills and knowledge in AI, data science, and data engineering.
* **Content Development**: Create high\-quality educational materials, tutorials, and documentation on AI, data science, and data engineering topics including PySpark, Scala, and Hadoop.
* **Content Review**: Review and provide feedback on existing content to ensure technical accuracy and clarity.
* **Collaboration**: Work with instructional designers, educators, and technical writers to develop comprehensive and engaging learning modules.
* **Research**: Stay current with the latest advancements in AI, data science, and data engineering to ensure content remains up\-to\-date and relevant.
* **Mentorship**: Provide guidance and mentorship to team members and learners on complex AI and data engineering topics.
* **Quality Assurance**: Ensure all content meets the highest standards of accuracy, clarity, and pedagogical effectiveness.

***Required Skills and Qualifications:***

* **Education**: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Data Engineering, or a related field.
* **Experience**: Proven experience as a practitioner or researcher in AI, data science, and data engineering with significant experience in training and mentoring.

***Technical Skills:***

* **Programming Languages**: Python, Scala
* **Big Data Technologies:** Hadoop (including HDFS, MapReduce, Hive), PySpark, Spark
* **Data Engineering:** Data collection, preprocessing, and transformation, Data pipeline creation and maintenance, ETL processes (Extract, Transform, Load)
* **Machine Learning:** Knowledge of various machine learning algorithms and models, Experience with frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, and scikit\-learn
* **Data Science:** Statistical analysis and modeling, Data visualization tools and techniques, Exploratory data analysis
* **Model Deployment:** Experience in deploying machine learning models in production environments
* **Cloud Platforms:** Familiarity with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud and their AI/ML and big data services

***Analytical and Problem\-Solving Skills:***

* **Analytical Thinking**: Ability to break down complex problems and identify solutions using AI and data engineering techniques.
* **Problem Solving**: Strong problem\-solving skills to tackle challenging AI/data engineering issues and optimize models.

***Communication and Collaboration Skills:***

* **Written Communication**: Excellent writing skills to create clear, concise, and engaging content on AI and data engineering topics.
* **Verbal Communication**: Ability to explain complex concepts to non\-experts in an accessible manner.
* **Collaboration**: Experience working with cross\-functional teams, including instructional designers, educators, and technical writers.

***Educational and Content Development Skills:***

* **Teaching and Mentoring**: Experience in teaching or mentoring others in AI/data engineering topics.
* **Content Creation**: Experience in developing educational materials, tutorials, technical documentation, and guides.
* **Content Review**: Skills in reviewing and providing feedback on technical content to ensure accuracy and clarity.

***Research Skills:***

* **Staying Updated**: Keeping up with the latest trends, research, and developments in AI, data science, and data engineering.
* **Research and Development**: Ability to conduct research and apply new findings to improve content and teaching methods.

***Preferred Qualifications:***

* **Advanced Degree**: A Master’s or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Data Science, Data Engineering, or a related field.
* **Publication Record**: Experience in publishing research papers or technical articles in AI, data science, or data engineering.
* **Additional Big Data Tools**: Knowledge of other big data tools and technologies like Kafka and Flink.

***Interpersonal Skills:***

* **Team Player**: Ability to work effectively as part of a team.
* **Adaptability**: Flexibility to adapt to changing requirements and technologies.
* **Attention to Detail**: High attention to detail to ensure accuracy and quality in content development.

jobTitle: Senior Software Engineering Lead - Java, AI/ML
description:
Optum is a global organization that delivers care, aided by technology to help millions of people live healthier lives. The work you do with our team will directly improve health outcomes by connecting people with the care, pharmacy benefits, data and resources they need to feel their best. Here, you will find a culture guided by diversity and inclusion, talented peers, comprehensive benefits and career development opportunities. Come make an impact on the communities we serve as you help us advance health equity on a global scale. Join us to start **Caring. Connecting. Growing together.**

  


**Primary Responsibilities:**


* Analyze, Design, Code, Review, Integrate, Implement, Install, Deploy and Maintenance of the computer programs and software components using specific tools and latest technologies including Java/J2EE, Web services (REST and SOAP), Microservices Framework, Apache Kafka, Spring Boot, Kubernetes, and Docker, JSON, Node JS, Casandra, GraphQL etc.
* Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable RESTful APIs for data exchange between healthcare systems
* Provides technical direction for the development, design, and systems integration across multiple client engagements from definition phase through implementation
* Using azure infra for deployment/maintenance of applications
* Lead the design, development, and deployment of machine learning models and AI systems to address healthcare challenges
* Conduct exploratory data analysis (EDA), statistical analysis, and feature engineering to interpret complex healthcare data to provide actionable insights
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams, including clinicians, researchers, and IT, to identify business needs and translate them into technical solutions
* Develop and implement advanced algorithms and statistical models to solve healthcare\-specific problems, such as predictive analytics, patient risk stratification, and medical image analysis
* Optimize and enhance existing machine learning models for better performance and scalability in healthcare settings
* Develop and integrate generative AI models and large language models (LLMs) for tasks such as medical text generation, data augmentation, and synthetic data generation
* Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI/ML technologies and integrate them into ongoing healthcare projects
* Mentor and guide junior data scientists and engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement
* Ensure data integrity, accuracy, and security, complying with healthcare regulations such as HIPAA
* Develop and maintain documentation for models, processes, and systems
* Comply with the terms and conditions of the employment contract, company policies and procedures, and any and all directives (such as, but not limited to, transfer and/or re\-assignment to different work locations, change in teams and/or work shifts, policies in regards to flexibility of work benefits and/or work environment, alternative work arrangements, and other decisions that may arise due to the changing business environment). The Company may adopt, vary or rescind these policies and directives in its absolute discretion and without any limitation (implied or otherwise) on its ability to do so

**Required Qualifications:**


* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* 4\+ years of experience in data science, machine learning, or AI engineering roles like GenAI, Statistical Analysis, Data Mining, and Data Visualization, ML framework and libraries TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit\-learn, and Keras
* 8\+ years experience as a Full Stack Engineer with Solid proficiency in Java, SpringBoot, Python or other backend programming languages
* Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., Azure) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
* Solid understanding of database concepts, distributed systems, and data warehousing principles

  


**Preferred Qualifications:**


* Master’s degree
* Azure certifications
* Familiarity with the US Healthcare domain

  


*At UnitedHealth Group, our mission is to help people live healthier lives and make the health system work better for everyone. We believe everyone–of every race, gender, sexuality, age, location and income–deserves the opportunity to live their healthiest life. Today, however, there are still far too many barriers to good health which are disproportionately experienced by people of color, historically marginalized groups and those with lower incomes. We are committed to mitigating our impact on the environment and enabling and delivering equitable care that addresses health disparities and improves health outcomes \- an enterprise priority reflected in our mission.*

**Key Responsibilities**

* **Research and Innovation**
* Conduct cutting\-edge research on educational technology methodologies, pedagogies, and tools.
* Develop and prototype innovative learning solutions that leverage emerging technologies (AI, ML, VR/AR, etc.) to enhance engagement and learning outcomes.
* Identify trends, needs, and opportunities in the EdTech market to influence the direction of product development.
* **Product Development and Testing**
* Collaborate with product and engineering teams to design, test, and implement educational tools and resources.
* Oversee and manage the research and development lifecycle for EdTech products, from concept to deployment.
* Conduct usability studies and analyze user feedback to continuously improve the learning experience and effectiveness of the products.
* **Data Analysis and Evaluation**
* Develop and execute evaluation protocols to measure the efficacy of learning tools and solutions.
* Use advanced statistical methods and data science techniques to interpret and validate results.
* Report findings in clear, actionable insights to stakeholders to guide data\-driven decisions.
* **Collaboration and Communication**
* Work closely with cross\-functional teams, including curriculum designers, engineers, data scientists, and product managers, to integrate research findings into product development.
* Present research findings and product insights to internal teams and external stakeholders at conferences, webinars, and other industry events.
* Author white papers, reports, and publications to contribute to the broader EdTech research community and represent the organization’s thought leadership.
* **Mentorship and Knowledge Sharing**
* Mentor junior researchers, R\&D associates, and team members on research methodologies and best practices.
* Establish and maintain an R\&D knowledge base to facilitate information sharing and continuous learning within the organization.

**Required Qualifications**

* **Education**: Ph.D. in Education, Learning Sciences, Computer Science, Cognitive Science, Human\-Computer Interaction, or a related field.
* **Experience**: 3\+ years of relevant experience in EdTech research and/or product development, including a solid track record of applied research and successful implementation of findings.
* **Technical Skills**:
* Proficiency in research methodologies, statistical analysis, and data interpretation.
* Hands\-on experience with data analysis software (e.g., Python, R, SPSS) and usability testing tools.
* Familiarity with EdTech tools and technologies (e.g., AI, VR/AR, adaptive learning systems).
* **Soft Skills**:
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a track record of presentations and publications.
* Strong problem\-solving abilities, with an innovative approach to educational challenges.
* Ability to work effectively in a collaborative, multidisciplinary environment.

**Preferred Qualifications**

* Prior experience in an EdTech startup or rapidly scaling tech environment.
* Proven history of published research in peer\-reviewed journals and/or reputable EdTech publications.
* Experience with grant writing and securing research funding.

Job description:

CACTUS is a remote\-first organisation and we embrace an accelerate from anywhere culture. You may be required to travel to our Mumbai office based on business requirements or for company/team events.

Job Overview


TechSagar is a consolidated and comprehensive repository of India’s emerging tech capabilities which provides actionable insights about capabilities of the Indian Industry, Academia \& Research across 27 technology areas like IoT, AI/ML, Blockchain, Cloud \& Virtualization, Robotics \& Automation, AR/VR, Wireless \& Networking, and more. The office of National Cyber Security Coordinator, in partnership with Data Security Council of India conceptualized ‘National Technology Capability Repository’, and this gave rise to TechSagar. The Data Security Council of India is putting forth this effort through a variety of initiatives and programmes, including the creation of a dynamic repository of the country's cyber technology capabilities. The Consultant Technical, would be steering DSCI's work to add ground\-up value in the efforts taken in the country for technology development.

4 to 8 years of experience as a Technical Project Manager with a focus on web portal management.
Strong technical skills with the ability to conduct in\-depth technical analyses in critical technology areas. Strong understanding of artificial intelligence (AI) principles, LLMs and web development technologies.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
Demonstrated ability to engage and collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.
Proficient in project management tools and methodologies.

Hi All,

Role Description:

This is a full\-time on\-site role as a Machine Learning Engineer at Stratforge in Chennai. The Machine Learning Engineer will be responsible for pattern recognition, developing neural networks, applying statistical analysis, and implementing algorithms on a day\-to\-day basis.

Responsibilities:

* Develop and deploy machine learning models: Design, build, train, and evaluate various models, including deep learning, natural language processing, and time series analysis models, leveraging your understanding of core ML concepts like supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning paradigms. This includes experience with Transformer models and their applications. • Data processing and feature engineering: Clean, transform, and prepare large datasets for model training and evaluation. Develop innovative feature engineering techniques to improve model performance. • LLM and RAG development: Build and fine\-tune LLMs for specific tasks related to voice and data analytics. Implement RAG systems to enhance LLM performance with external knowledge sources. • Prompt\-to\-SQL generation: Develop models that can translate natural language queries into SQL queries, enabling users to easily access and analyze data. • Data insights and visualization: Develop algorithms and tools to extract meaningful insights from data and present them clearly and concisely. • Classifier development: Build and train classifiers for various tasks, such as sentiment analysis, topic classification, and intent recognition. This includes understanding different classification algorithms (e.g., logistic regression, support vector machines, decision trees) and performance metrics (e.g., precision, recall, F1\- score). • Model optimization and deployment: Optimize model performance for speed and accuracy. Deploy models to production environments using appropriate tools and technologies. • Stay up\-to\-date: Keep abreast of the latest advancements in machine learning and related fields. Explore and experiment with new techniques and technologies.
* Collaborate effectively: Work closely with other engineers, product managers, and researchers to deliver high\-quality solutions.

Requirements:

* 2\-4 years of experience developing and deploying machine learning models in a production environment. • Strong understanding of fundamental machine learning concepts, including model selection, evaluation metrics, bias\-variance tradeoffs, and regularization techniques. • Solid grasp of neural networks, including different architectures (e.g., CNNs, RNNs, Transformers), activation functions, backpropagation, and optimization algorithms. Deep understanding of Transformer models, including attention mechanisms, selfattention, and different Transformer variants (e.g., BERT, GPT). • Experience with classification modelling techniques, including handling imbalanced datasets, multi\-class classification, and model interpretation. • Strong programming skills in Python and experience with relevant libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit\-learn, and Hugging Face Transformers. Specifically, experience fine\-tuning and deploying Transformer models using these libraries. Nice to Have: • Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP, including deploying and managing Transformer models at scale. • Experience with database technologies such as SQL and NoSQL. • Experience with version control systems such as Git. • Excellent communication and collaboration skills. • Experience with LLMs, RAG, and prompt engineering, specifically using Transformerbased models, is a strong plus. • Experience with voice data processing and analysis is a plus.

What We Offer:

* Competitive Salary: We offer a competitive salary and benefits package. • Chance to work on impactful projects that push the boundaries of AI and machine learning • Growth Opportunities: Opportunities for professional development and career advancement. • Cutting\-Edge Technology: Work with the latest technologies and tools in a fastpaced environment. • Collaborative Culture: A supportive and collaborative work environment that fosters innovation.

jobTitle: Researcher – Smart Grids and Energy Optimization
description:
**Company Description**  

At **Bosch Research**, research meets application. Around 1,700 experts around the world develop the technologies of tomorrow and beyond. The world in which we live is changing rapidly. Global mega trends such as climate change and digitalization influence virtually every area of day\-to\-day life. One thing that doesn’t change is Bosch’s mission to create technology that is “Invented for life” in other words using technological innovations to improve people’s quality of life and using natural resources responsibly. Bosch Research sees itself as the spearhead of innovation at Bosch: Our researchers are involved in around a quarter of the patent applications filed by Bosch. On the one hand, we help all Bosch divisions to develop the next generation of products or the generation after that. On the other hand, we look far into the future: with our partners in science and industry, we identify technologies and trends which will shape our lives in the future and make them usable for the entire company. As a global team with around 1,700 experts from all over the world, we cover a wide range of areas with our research. Whether it be automation, digitalization and connectivity, artificial intelligence (AI), electrification, climate action and sustainability or healthcare: Bosch Research combines top\-level research with specific technological developments.


For more information visit: **https://www.bosch.com/research/**

The Research and Technology Center at Bangalore focuses on research in time series analysis, natural language processing, computer vision, numerical methods for embedded real time systems, and hybrid modelling (Scientific Machine Learning \- SciML). We pursue research and development by working with top\-tier universities worldwide and our corporate partners.

 **Job Description**  

* Collaborate with team members to conduct research and advance state\-of\-the\-art methods in integration of electric vehicles (EVs) and flexible loads with the grid and energy optimization.
* Design, develop, and implement advanced real\-time modeling and optimization algorithms for energy management and EV integration into larger utility grid and behind\-the meter use cases for buildings and homes.
* Design, develop, and implement learning and prediction algorithms to predict energy consumption of buildings.
* Evaluate grid impacts of EV charging and develop new smart charging solutions.
* Collaborate with stakeholders from business units to identify potential use cases and ensure practical utilization of research outcomes and product\-technology fit.
* Publish research findings in reputable journals and conferences.

**Requirements**

* Good track record of research publications in reputable journals and conferences
* Excellent coding skills (e.g., Python, MATLAB) along with practical experience in version control, software testing, and linting
* Hands\-on experience in commonly used simulation tools in system modelling and simulation
* Strong knowledge in algorithm development and optimization methods (discrete and continuous)
* Excellent understanding of smart grids, electric vehicle fundamentals and charging protocols
* Experience with handling big data and big data analytics
* Profound problem\-solving skills and ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a research team environment.
* Excellent presentation and communication skills

**Additionally, the following would be desirable and an added advantage:**

* Prior experience with cloud and edge computing
* Prior work experience in corporate research setting or academic research before or after Ph.D.
* Solid understanding of software development fundamentals and hands\-on experience in software development technology stack

  

**Qualifications**  

Ph.D. in Engineering (preferably Electrical, Mechanical, or Computer Science) from top Indian institutes (IITs, IIITs, IISc etc.) or from top international institutes

 **Additional Information**  

3\+ years

### **Vice President, Operations**


**Location – Pune, India (Hybrid)**


#### **Data\-Driven Research and Insights**



MarketCast combines the power of research, technology, and data science to help marketers and researchers maximize their advertising impact and unlock brand Fandom.



Our data and insights guide critical marketing decisions, helping brands determine which fandom audiences to prioritize and product benefits to communicate, in addition to developing, launching, and measuring brand and advertising campaigns across media platforms. Today our clients represent the biggest names in entertainment, tech, consumer brands, and sports and video games, and our impact touches the lives of billions of people around the globe.



We are seeking a visionary and results\-oriented Vice President of Operations to lead our cutting\-edge research operations in India. This is a pivotal leadership role, driving significant operational transformation and leveraging advanced technologies to enhance efficiency, quality, and client impact. The ideal candidate will be a proven change agent with a passion for innovation, a strong track record in leading large, geographically dispersed teams, and a deep understanding of the global market research landscape.


**\#FandomIsOurJam**


**We’re looking for:**


* **Strategic Leadership \& Vision:** Develop and execute a comprehensive strategic plan for India operations, aligning with MarketCast's global strategy and leveraging advanced technologies (AI, ML, automation, cloud computing, etc.) to optimize research processes and deliver exceptional client outcomes.
* **Team Leadership \& Development: Build**, mentor, and motivate a high\-performing team of internal professionals in Pune and contract professionals, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement. Implement robust talent development programs, focusing on upskilling and cross\-training to leverage diverse skill sets within the team.
* **Technology \& Innovation**: Work closely with CTO and the rest of the technology team located in Pune to implement solutions that leverage the latest advancements in research technologies, including AI\-powered analytics, predictive modeling, automated data collection, and advanced visualization tools. Lead the implementation of the new technologies to enhance operational capabilities and deliver innovative solutions for our research teams and clients.
* **Stakeholder Relationship Management**: Cultivate strong relationships with US and UK based business and Operations teams, understanding their evolving needs, proactively proposing innovative solutions and effectively communicating progress and insights.
* **Operational Excellence \& Transformation**: Drive operational efficiencies through the implementation of advanced technologies, process automation, and data\-driven decision\-making. Develop and implement key performance indicators (KPIs) to track progress and identify areas for improvement. Champion the adoption and integration of MarketCast's proprietary platforms and technologies.
* **Vendor Management**: Manage relationships with key technology vendors and suppliers, ensuring seamless integration and optimal performance. Negotiate contracts and manage budgets effectively.
* **Cross\-Functional Collaboration**: Collaborate effectively with cross\-functional teams across different geographical locations (US, UK, etc.) to ensure alignment on strategic priorities and seamless execution of research projects.
* **Financial Management**: Manage the assigned budget effectively, ensuring optimal resource allocation and demonstrating a strong ROI on operational initiatives.
* **Compliance \& Governance:** Establish and maintain robust governance systems, ensuring compliance with all relevant regulations and internal policies.


**It’ll be helpful if you have:**


* 15\+ years of experience in building and managing complex, tech\-enabled operations functions within a market research or similar data\-intensive industry.
* 5\+ years of hands\-on experience in market research operations, with a demonstrable track record of successfully implementing technology\-driven transformations.
* Proven experience leading and mentoring teams, with a strong focus on talent development and succession planning.
* Deep understanding of advanced technologies such as AI, Machine Learning, cloud computing, and automation within a market research context.
* Exceptional analytical and problem\-solving skills, with a proven ability to translate complex data into actionable insights and strategic recommendations.
* Demonstrated experience in driving operational efficiencies and cost optimization initiatives.
* Strong client management and relationship building skills, with experience presenting complex information to senior stakeholders.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate across diverse teams and geographies.
* Deep understanding of the US and Indian market research landscapes, including cultural nuances and business practices.
* Bachelor's degree required; Master's degree preferred. MBA is a plus.


**Benefits and Perks:**


* Mediclaim for employees and legal dependents
* Accidental policy for employees
* 18 days Annual Paid Leave, plus 12 Public holidays
* Hybrid working model with 2 days a week to work from home
* Professional Pursuit Reimbursement program
* Global Wellness Plan
* And, more

  


**Our Purpose:**



Fandom connects people with shared passions and builds communities around them. It offers them space to express their joy and love, whether that’s for superheroes, sports teams, or even small batch whiskeys. At MarketCast, we believe in the power of fandom. It’s as important for brands as it is for action heroes and we do fandom research, data science and analytics better than anyone on the planet. This obsessive focus on fans helps the world’s top creators, media platforms, and sports leagues transform followers into fanatics and investments into impact.

  


**Our Core Values:**

  


**Curiosity Makes Us Tick**



Our love of learning manifests in everything we do \- from the surveys we field and the datasets we analyze to the technology we develop. Where others pause, we push forward, uncovering hidden meaning and answers. Always learning, always looking for more.

  


**We Celebrate Wins**



Whether its wowing clients with research or solving everyday challenges, we pause to honor great work and everyone who plays a role in it. We acknowledge and recognize great work and hustle that helps deliver the very best outcomes.

  


**Trust is Always Trending**



Trust means everything to us. It’s lending a hand when deadlines loom, always delivering on the promises we make, and calling out behavior that harms our culture. And our client’s trust is what makes all this possible, something we never take for granted.

  


**We Roll with Change**



We embrace change as an opportunity to learn, grow, and further develop. We do this by challenging our biases and rethinking how things have always been done in the past. This fresh, open\-minded approach keeps us agile, innovating, and adapting in the face of uncertainty.

  


**Diversity is Our Superpower**



Our differences make us stronger. As researchers and data scientists, we have a responsibility to reflect the diverse audiences and communities all around us. Understanding people, opinions and life experiences fuels our insights and deepens our perspectives.

  



At MarketCast, we don't just accept difference \- we embrace it, support it, and thrive on it for the benefit of our global culture and success. MarketCast is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know. Head of AI Governance


**Category:** Data \& AI
**Location:**Bangalore, Karnataka, IN
.
**Department \-** AI \& Analytics CoE  


Are you passionate about using AI to improve patient lives? Do you believe in the transformative power of AI, but you are also deeply aware of its concerns and ethical implications? Do you spend time following the field all the way from tech and business news to latest research in Machine Learning (ML)/Generative AI (GenAI) development and Ethics? If you are nodding at this point, then read on! Apply Now!  


**The position**
We are seeking an experienced and highly motivated leader to head a team of top AI scientists, governance professionals and ethicists. As a leader you are responsible for defining, implementing, and governing AI processes within a large, highly regulated enterprise. Your role will focus on ensuring the effective, ethical, and legal use of AI technologies while aligning with organizational and regulatory standards. You will serve as a leader in shaping AI and compliance frameworks, and fostering collaboration between business, legal, and technical teams.  

We expect you to have a deep understanding of AI systems, data management, and regulatory requirements, with a proven ability to lead governance efforts in a large\-scale enterprise setting. If you are passionate about AI governance and have the experience and skills required for this position, we encourage you to apply. This is an excellent opportunity to lead the development and implementation of AI governance policies and procedures in a dynamic and innovative organization.  


**Your responsibilities are to:**
* Lead a team of skilled AI researchers and ethicists, fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and excellence.
* Provide guidance, coaching, and motivation to your team, taking pride in their success as they implement the business strategy you help shape.
* Establish technical guidelines and frameworks for the development, deployment, and operation of AI systems to assess and manage AI risks and benefits, addressing issues related to bias mitigation, fairness, transparency, accountability, security, as well as legal and compliance matters.
* Refine and enhance Novo Nordisk’s existing AI governance policies and procedures to ensure the responsible use of AI and develop new policies to align with evolving best practices and regulations.
* Collaborate closely with data science, engineering, research, and product teams to identify and address ethical concerns related to data collection, modeling, and deployment of AI.
* Lead cross\-functional AI governance and process groups to ensure alignment and effective implementation of AI governance policies and procedures.
* Collaborate with the Business, Ethics, and Compliance team and monitor the ethical use of AI.
* Aid in the development of training and educational programs to promote responsible use of AI.
* Collaborate with legal, privacy, information security, and compliance teams to ensure AI initiatives comply with relevant laws and regulations.
* Work with Novo Nordisk’s Public Policy team to engage with external stakeholders and industry associations.
* Serve as a subject matter expert on AI governance, supporting both internal and external stakeholders.

**Qualifications**
* We prefer you have a BSc, MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Data Science, AI/ML, Business or other relevant fields. including several years of work experience
* Proven track record of managing AI processes in a large, highly regulated enterprise
* Several years of leadership experience with a background in AI is essential
* Extensive knowledge of AI/ML, data management systems, regulatory frameworks, and ethical AI practices.
* Experience working with cross\-functional teams, including data science, engineering, legal, and compliance.
* Deep technical understanding of AI systems, model lifecycle management, and associated risks.
* Strong knowledge of governance principles, privacy laws, and industry\-specific regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, FCRA).
* Ability to navigate complex regulatory environments and provide pragmatic solutions to governance challenges.
* Expertise in risk management frameworks, audit processes, and AI/ML validation techniques.
* Able to navigate a complex and senior stakeholder network, including business senior leaders, through effective communication and expectation setting
* Understanding of pharmaceutical value chain and how to collaborate across the enterprise to bring change and accelerate impact is a plus.
* Excellent leadership and communication skills (both written and spoken in English is a must), with the ability to inspire and motivate teams and stakeholders.

**About the department**
We are a growing organization of data scientists, machine learning engineers, and developers partnering to deliver impactful end\-to\-end data products, analytics, and AI/GenAI use cases. Our work spans across research, commercial, and production, and we're focused on industrializing and democratizing AI. We use scalable data platforms, MLOps, reference architectures, and modular components that span the entire data and ML lifecycle. We are cloud\-native and primarily work in AWS and MS Azure. We are agile, embrace diverse thinking and continuous learning, and foster a culture of feedback and honesty, all while having fun. Our mission is to \#BringDataToLife; to convert data to understandings and insights, drive optimization and create true value to Novo Nordisk and the patient lives we serve. Every day, our thousands of digital experts work in all areas of technology. We navigate the tech spectrum from front\-end to back\-end, from artificial intelligence to machine learning, and from cloud systems to quantum computing. All to make a tangible impact on lives across the globe. How? Go explore at TechLife at Novo Nordisk.  


**Working at Novo Nordisk**
Novo Nordisk is a leading global healthcare company with a 100\-year legacy of driving change to defeat serious chronic diseases. Building on our strong legacy within diabetes, we are growing massively and expanding our commitment, reaching millions around the world and impacting more than 40 million patient lives daily. All of this has made us one of the 20 most valuable companies in the world by market cap. Our success relies on the joint potential and collaboration of our more than 63,000 employees around the world. We recognize the importance of the unique skills and perspectives our people bring to the table, and we work continuously to bring out the best in them. Working at Novo Nordisk, we’re working toward something bigger than ourselves, and it’s a collective effort. Join us! Together, we go further. Together, we’re life changing.  


**Contact**
To submit your application, please upload your CV online (click on Apply and follow the instructions).  


**Deadline**
20th November 2024  


***Disclaimer***
*It has been brought to our attention that there have recently been instances of fraudulent job offers, purporting to be from Novo Nordisk and/or its affiliate companies. The individuals or organizations sending these false employment offers may pose as a Novo Nordisk recruiter or representative and request personal information, purchasing of equipment or funds to further the recruitment process or offer paid trainings. Be advised that Novo Nordisk does not extend unsolicited employment offers. Furthermore, Novo Nordisk does not charge prospective employees with fees or make requests for funding as a part of the recruitment process.*  



We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.  


At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.

We at Big Oh Notation are looking for **Legal Researcher** **Trainee (Female Preferred).**

**Job Location:** Noida

**Official Website:** www.bigohtech.com

**Compensation: 1\.92 LPA during the first 4 months of training period \|\| 4 LPA post training period.**

**About Big Oh Notation**

Big Oh Notation creates enterprise\-level, cutting\-edge software products and helps companies achieve their business goals by providing high quality IT talent.

Big Oh Notation is an ISO 27001 and CMMI Level 3 certified company that delivers a result that marks the difference between service and professionalism.

**Legal Researcher Trainee:**

We are an AI company dedicated to providing citizens with free and accurate legal advice. Join us in our mission to make legal information accessible to everyone.

**You are a perfect fit, if you have...**

* Proficiency in legal research and analysis.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills.
* Quick adaptability to changing environments and learning new skills.
* Ability to thrive in a fast\-paced environment.

jobTitle: Development Architect - SAP AI Core/ Generative AI Hub
description:
**Title – Architect – SAP AI Core/ Generative AI Hub**

**Meet Our Team**


SAP AI Core Product Engineering Team is part of the SAP Business AI unit and one of the key drivers of the Intelligent Enterprise. SAP's vision is to "bring out the best in every business" and to become the "\#1 enterprise application and business AI company" by " infusing business AI across the SAP product portfolio”. Our vision for AI Core is to provide a hub that offers a seamless end\-to\-end journey for product engineering teams in SAP and our ecosystem accelerating time to market value for AI developments.


We are responsible for foundational products such as SAP Generative AI Hub, AI Core and AI Launchpad that help application AI Developers infuse AI capabilities in their existing products and as new AI\-first product faster. Our teams are located in Germany, Singapore, and India, exemplifying an innovative, start\-up\-like work environment.

 **What You'll Do**


As an **Architect**, you will lead the technical design and architecture of AI Core, ensuring that systems are robust, scalable, and efficient. Provide technical leadership and guidance to development teams, ensuring adherence to architectural best practices and product standards. Author clear technical documentation and presentations in collaboration with product engineers and architects to communicate architecture and design options to educate engineering teams and product managers.


You will have a great opportunity to learn and work on emerging technologies, solving high impact real\-world problems at the intersection of Cloud, DevOps, and Artificial Intelligence which is a strategic priority for SAP.


Your tasks will include:

* **Architect and Design AI Core Features**: Lead the end\-to\-end architecture of AI solutions and platforms, ensuring scalability, security, and high performance.
* **Drive Innovation**: Lead the evaluation, design, and integration of cutting\-edge AI technologies, with a focus on generative AI, machine learning, and cloud\-native architectures
* **Collaborate Across Teams**: Work closely with cross\-functional teams including developers, DevOps engineers, and AI researchers to create a unified technical vision and drive high\-impact projects.
* **Optimize System Performance**: Ensure that systems are optimized for large\-scale data processing, AI workloads, and high availability.
* **Mentor and Inspire Teams**: Provide technical leadership, mentoring junior engineers, and driving best practices for software architecture and full stack development.
* **Strategize Future Growth**: Work with Product Leaders and management to align technical strategies with business goals, identifying expansion opportunities
* **Oversee Quality and Security**: Ensure that systems meet the highest standards for security, performance, and scalability. Lead code reviews, architecture audits, and system evaluations.
* Explore, understand, and implement most recent technologies and approaches for enhancing the value and adoption of AICore.


**What You Bring**

* Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields. Master’s degree preferred
* 10\+ years of experience in software development and architecture, with a focus on cloud\-based AI solutions.
* Sound experience leading teams and architecting complex systems with real\-world AI applications.
* Strong expertise in cloud\-native platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and AI technologies.
* Hands\-on experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), microservices, and SAP Business Technology Platform.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Go, or JavaScript
* Deep understanding of DevOps practices, including CI/CD, automation, and orchestration tools like Jenkins, Helm, Istio, and Argo
* Foundation in AI and machine learning model integration, particularly generative AI, and large language models (LLMs)
* Proven track record in technical leadership, mentoring, and collaboration across global, distributed teams.
* Ability to tackle complex architectural problems and deliver innovative solutions under tight deadlines.


Nice to have

* Experience in developing AI tools or frameworks, especially in enterprise contexts.
* Exposure to Generative AI and build SAP Embedded AI solutions
* Knowledge of AI ethics and data privacy in AI deployments


We are looking for passionate architects eager to leverage their cloud application development and technical leadership experience to make a transformative impact in the strategically vital Business AI universe. Join us in shaping the future of AI\-driven enterprise solutions


TBD


**Bring out your best**


SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end\-to\-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose\-driven and future\-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.

**We win with inclusion**


SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well\-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.  

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e\-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com  

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.

**EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability:**


Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.  

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

**Bengali \_ AI Data Trainer \- Fully Remote**



The Business Context



You already use AI in many ways—like deciding what products and services to order—and it may be most familiar to you as a chatbot, as an avatar\-maker, or as a way to unlock your screen. But here's what AI may be able to help the world with: finding medical diagnoses, teaching you about scientific research, and calculating the complexities of any function.



But, like humans, algorithms are what they eat. They're only as good as the rules they know and the data they're trained on. We're the team that helps model these behaviors.



The Role



As an Advanced AI Data Trainer you will be working closely with a team of other trainers, within protocols developed by the world's leading AI researchers— training the AI to read, write, summarize knowledge, and interpret meaning. Think of it like being a language arts teacher or a personal tutor for some of the world's most influential technology.



The goal of this AI is to be a safe, accurate, widely knowledgeable, and beneficial conversation partner to the world for a wide variety of purposes. Your job is to train, evaluate, and test the AI's conversation skills, continuously equipping it to fulfill that purpose.



Day in and day out, you will:


**Train the AI**



You'll spend the bulk of your time generating examples of ideal conversations, acting as both the User and the AI for the AI to learn from, collecting sources helping it read large swaths of humanity's documented knowledge and distinguish between what is presented as fact vs. context vs. patterns of behavior.


**Evaluate the AI**



Our partner's mission is to develop AI models that are safe, accurate, and beneficial to humanity. You will continuously evaluate the AI according to those criteria and our training methods. For example, you will be discerning the accuracy of the facts that the AI is outputting, but also the accuracy with which they *interpret them.*


**Test the AI**



How is testing different from evaluation? As the project grows over time, you'll spend time actively trying to "break" the AI by "forcing" mistakes and improving the way these AI models recover. This is absolutely critical to its safety, accuracy, and use. You'll document breaks and have the opportunity to recommend improvements to the training methods themselves to both our team and our client.



The Person



This is a technology job that accommodates humanities people and relies more fully on your *competencies* than your formal experience––making it a rare opportunity that's perfect for new grads, career transitioners, and those seeking an exciting encore career.



You're the sort of person who is exceptional at generating copy intuitively. You've also got the metacognitive awareness to "show your work." In addition, you're the sort of person with a deep interest in linguistics. If you didn't get a Ph.D., you probably wanted one. You instinctively document learnings and continuously refine methods.



You are a(n):


* Dedicated Grammarian
* Natural Writer
* Diligent Reader
* Observant Listener
* Self\-Aware Interpreter
* Synthetic Sense\-Maker
* Perpetual Learner
* Instinctive Educator
* **Fluent in Bengali\***


**Compensation \& Career**


**Compensation**



This is an entry\-level *role* perfect for voracious readers early in their careers, or for career switchers keen to enter the technology field. Pay begins between **$6\.00\-$10\.00 / hour** to top applicants worldwide.  

  

**Must be fluent in Bengali(C1 \- C2\)**  

**MInimum: Conversational \- Advanced English (B1 \- C1\)**  

**P:S. We work in English however the AI Training will be done in Bengali so its important that you are at least conversational in English for our internal meetings**

**About the Role**


We’re looking for a Lead Conversation Designer, with minimum 6 years of experience in crafting exceptional user experiences in digital products. This role is perfect for someone who’s passionate about pioneering seamless, human\-centered interactions that merge conversational AI with robust UX principles. You’ll lead the design of engaging and strategic conversations for conversational AI projects across Flipkart fostering intuitive and meaningful interactions that build trust and deepen user engagement. As an experienced design lead, you can communicate effectively across teams, mentor junior designers, and drive innovation in line with business objectives. Your strong analytical and empathetic approach ensures your designs are not only creative but grounded in user research and data\-driven insights.

**About the team**


You'll be joining the Flipkart Design team which comprises of a diverse and highly talented group of product designers, UX researchers, creative designers, content \& conversation designers.

**You are Responsible for**

* Strategic Design Leadership: Define and shape the vision for conversational interfaces across multiple projects, balancing user needs with business goals.
* User\-Centric Flow Design: Rapidly understand project priorities and user goals, translating them into clear, structured conversation flows and comprehensive workflows.
* Advanced Dialog Specifications: Develop detailed design specifications and dialog flows, especially for high\-priority interactions, ensuring clarity and precision in every conversation turn.
* End\-to\-End Product Thinking: Drive conversational design with a holistic approach, ensuring that conversational interactions contribute to a cohesive customer journey and broader business goals.
* Stakeholder Communication and Presentation: Clearly communicate complex design concepts and the value of conversation design to both technical and non\-technical stakeholders.
* User Research and Analysis: Integrate insights from user research and conversational analytics to refine flows, optimize user satisfaction, and ensure continuous improvement of the conversational experience.
* Data\-Driven Optimization and Experimentation: Regularly review conversational data and conduct A/B testing on flows to make informed, data\-driven design enhancements that improve engagement.
* Cross\-Functional Collaboration: Partner closely with product managers, engineers, data scientists, and other designers to ensure conversational experiences align seamlessly with overall product vision and UX design.
* Designing for Scalability: Develop scalable design systems for conversational components, supporting easy updates and adjustments across multiple regions and use cases.
* Mentorship and Guidance: Provide design guidance and mentorship to junior designers, fostering a culture of innovation, empathy, and excellence within the team.

**To succeed in this role – you should have the following**


To be considered for this role, you should have:

* Experience \& Background: Minimum 6 years of experience in conversation design with a portfolio demonstrating innovative conversational solutions.
* Educational Background: A Bachelor's or Master's degree in Design, HCI, Cognitive Psychology, Linguistics, or a related field.
* Deep Conversational AI Knowledge: Proficiency in conversational AI and design principles, with practical experience in tools such as Voiceflow, Dialogflow, or similar platforms.
* Data Literacy and Experimentation: Ability to analyze conversational metrics, run A/B tests, and use these insights to make informed, iterative design improvements.
* Language Proficiency: Excellent command of English; conversational Hindi proficiency is a plus.
* Strategic Roadmap Development: Experience in defining and executing a strategic vision and roadmap for conversational products.
* Multi\-Modal Design Proficiency: Knowledge of multi\-modal design, creating cohesive experiences across text, voice, and other interaction types.
* Content Strategy and Tone of Voice: Skills in defining and applying a consistent tone and conversational style aligned with brand values.
* Agile and Lean Design Principles: Ability to work in agile environments, adapting designs to evolving needs while delivering high\-quality outcomes.

### Additional Skills That Will Set You Apart:

* UX and Service Design Acumen: Strong understanding of UX design principles and service design, with a proven ability to integrate these into conversational workflows.
* Voice and Chatbot Experience: Hands\-on experience with designing across various conversational platforms, including voice and multimodal systems.
* Leadership and Mentorship Abilities: Experience guiding design teams and fostering collaborative environments.

### **When you join Verizon**


You want more out of a career. A place to share your ideas freely — even if they’re daring or different. Where the true you can learn, grow, and thrive. At Verizon, we power and empower how people live, work and play by connecting them to what brings them joy. We do what we love — driving innovation, creativity, and impact in the world. Our V Team is a community of people who anticipate, lead, and believe that listening is where learning begins. In crisis and in celebration, we come together — lifting our communities and building trust in how we show up, everywhere \& always. Want in? Join the V Team Life.

You are good with numbers and you love to dig into data to find the story. You are detail\-oriented and know how to passionate about what really matters. Example: Build Fraud Test\-cases based on the user stories and automate them , as the solution builds test\-cases. You have to lead the design and implementation of the GenAI use\-cases that can facilitate and reduce manual hours that can both be process oriented and also enable secured customer journey. You should have hands\-on experience with LLMs and Gen AI , particularly prompt engineering framework. You need to design, develop, test and refine AI generated text prompts to maximize the effectiveness for various applications. You should have strong analytical and problem solving skills with the ability to think critically and troubleshoot issues. You should have hands\-on working with Large Language models such as Gemini AI. You should have solid understanding of cloud services, including Azure, AWS or GCP etc. You are a self\-starter and a multitasker who can work independently under tight timelines. You want to make an impact by providing the data that will help improve the experience of our customers.


You will need to have:

* Bachelor’s degree or four or more years of work experience.
* Six or more years of relevant work experience.

* Expertise in programming languages like Python, and relevant AI frameworks

Even better if you have one or more of the following:

* Advanced skills in programming in Python, Java, and Git using Open Source tools like Spark, Flink and Jupyter Notebook.

**AI Researcher (Language, Voice and Image)**

**Reports to : AI Director, Technology**  

  

**About Digital Green**  

  

Digital Green is a pioneer global not for profit organization, utilizing digital platforms and community\-driven approaches to amplify the voices of smallholder farmers and improve their livelihoods. Our mission is to create a world where farmers use technology and data to build prosperous communities. By harnessing the power of technology, we facilitate knowledge sharing, capacity building, and market linkages, enabling farmers to adopt sustainable agricultural practices and increase their productivity and income.  

  

We are dedicated to transforming the lives of under\-served smallholder farmers worldwide through innovative technology solutions. Backed by leading philanthropic organizations such as the Bill \& Melinda Gates Foundation (BMGF), Walmart Foundation, USAID, and UK Foreign, Commonwealth \& Development Office (UKFCDO), we are committed to leveraging data and technology to empower smallholder farmers and strengthen agricultural extension systems.

 **Job Summary**


As an AI Researcher at Digital Green, you will be at the forefront of innovation, driving the development of language, voice, and computer vision models specifically tailored for the agricultural domain. Your work will directly contribute to enhancing the capabilities of our conversational bots, voice\-enabled interfaces, and computer vision systems, enabling them to effectively understand and respond to user queries in local languages, recognize speech accurately, and analyze agricultural images. This role focuses on leveraging cutting\-edge machine learning techniques to address key challenges faced by smallholder farmers, ultimately driving positive impact and transformation in agricultural practices and livelihoods.


Key Responsibilities:

* Domain\-specific Language Modeling:
	+ Develop domain\-specific language models trained on agricultural text data to improve our bots' ability to understand and generate content related to farming practices, crop management, pest control, weather forecasting, and other relevant topics. This includes enhancing comprehension and generation in local languages commonly used by farmers and designing algorithms to recognize and interpret agricultural terminology, abbreviations, and regional dialects.
* Voice Recognition Model Development:
	+ Develop and optimize automatic speech recognition (ASR) models for native languages spoken by smallholder farmers, incorporating domain\-specific terminologies and regional dialects, using advanced techniques like deep learning, transfer learning, and data augmentation to ensure high accuracy and reliability in real\-world settings.
* Computer Vision Model Development:
	+ Design and develop computer vision models and generative AI algorithms for agricultural applications, including plant disease detection, field infestation monitoring, crop detection, and image generation from textual descriptions, utilizing real data collected from agricultural fields and remote sensing platforms..
* Data Collection and Annotation:
	+ Formulate and coordinate a comprehensive plan with program teams and third\-party services to collect, annotate, and ensure high\-quality agricultural text, speech, and image data in local languages, capturing diverse linguistic variations, agricultural contexts, and image scenarios for training and fine\-tuning models.
* Model Training, Optimization, and Evaluation:
	+ Train and optimize language, ASR, and computer vision models using state\-of\-the\-art techniques to achieve high accuracy and reliability.
	+ Evaluate model performance using key metrics such as accuracy, word error rate, precision, recall, and F1 score, and iteratively refine models based on feedback and insights.
* Collaboration and Integration:
	+ Collaborate closely with software engineers, data scientists, agricultural experts, and product managers to integrate AI capabilities into Digital Green's platforms, ensuring seamless functionality and user experience.
	+ Share insights and learnings with internal teams, government partners, and stakeholders to facilitate knowledge transfer and capacity building.
* Continuous Improvement and Knowledge Sharing:
	+ Stay updated with the latest advancements in NLP, ASR, and computer vision research and techniques, continuously refining and optimizing models to deliver state\-of\-the\-art performance.
	+ Document model architectures, training procedures, and best practices, and share knowledge with cross\-functional teams and stakeholders.


Qualifications:

* Education: Ph.D. or Master's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Engineering, or a related field with a focus on NLP, speech recognition, or computer vision.
* Experience: Proven experience of 8\+ years in AI research, with a strong track record of developing language models, ASR models, and computer vision algorithms. Experience in the agricultural domain is a plus.
* Programming Skills: Proficiency in Python and experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face Transformers, Kaldi, Mozilla DeepSpeech, OpenCV, and Keras.
* Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem\-solving skills, with the ability to critically evaluate research papers, design experiments, and interpret results.
* Domain Knowledge: Familiarity with agricultural practices, terminology, plant biology, crop diseases, and field monitoring techniques, with a demonstrated ability to customize AI solutions for domain\-specific requirements.
* Communication Skills: Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross\-functional teams and stakeholders and communicate technical concepts to non\-technical audiences.

**Compensation and Application Process:**

**Company Description**  

At **Bosch Research**, research meets application. Around 1,700 experts around the world develop the technologies of tomorrow and beyond. The world in which we live is changing rapidly. Global mega trends such as climate change and digitalization influence virtually every area of day\-to\-day life. One thing that doesn’t change is Bosch’s mission to create technology that is “Invented for life” in other words using technological innovations to improve people’s quality of life and using natural resources responsibly. Bosch Research sees itself as the spearhead of innovation at Bosch: Our researchers are involved in around a quarter of the patent applications filed by Bosch. On the one hand, we help all Bosch divisions to develop the next generation of products or the generation after that. On the other hand, we look far into the future: with our partners in science and industry, we identify technologies and trends which will shape our lives in the future and make them usable for the entire company. As a global team with around 1,700 experts from all over the world, we cover a wide range of areas with our research. Whether it be automation, digitalization and connectivity, artificial intelligence (AI), electrification, climate action and sustainability or healthcare: Bosch Research combines top\-level research with specific technological developments.


For more information visit: **https://www.bosch.com/research/**

The Research and Technology Center at Bangalore focuses on research in time series analysis, natural language processing, computer vision, numerical methods for embedded real time systems, and hybrid modelling (Scientific Machine Learning \- SciML). We pursue research and development by working with top\-tier universities worldwide and our corporate partners.

 **Job Description**  

For this role, the focus is set on machine learning applied to solving engineering systems which falls in the domains of fluids/solids/thermal in mechanical engineering.

* You’ll be part of our team and model mechanical systems accurately and reduce computational cost.
* You will simulate 1D/2D/3D multi\-physics models using numerical simulations, scripting and programming.
* You combine physics\-based models with data\-based approaches.
* You will work in international teams and perform necessary development/implementation to accomplish the tasks.
* Publish research findings in reputable journals and conferences.

**Required skills:**

* Proficient in Mathematics with solid engineering / physics background.
* Sound fundamentals of Numerical methods.
* Sound understanding of Linear algebra.
* Strong in Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) methods like PINNs, operator learning, system identification.
* Excellent programming skills in python.
* Good knowledge of partial differential equations.
* Numerical methods for modelling and simulation.• Excellent presentation and communication skills.

**Preferable skills:**

* Experience with simulation tools: Matlab, Simulink, and Ansys will be added advantage.
* Familiarity with high performance computing will be added advantage.

  

**Qualifications**  

MS/M.Tech, PhD from top Indian institutes (IITs, IIITs, IISc etc.) or from top international institutes with good track record of research publications related to numerical methods for modelling and simulation solid/fluid/thermal systems, AI/ML methods

 **Additional Information**  

3\+ years

jobTitle: AI ML Engineer - GenAI, NLP, ML, Python
description:
Optum AI is UnitedHealth Group’s enterprise AI team. We are AI/ML scientists and engineers with deep expertise in AI/ML engineering for health care. We develop AI/ML solutions for the highest impact opportunities across UnitedHealth Group businesses including UnitedHealthcare, Optum Financial, Optum Health, Optum Insight, and Optum Rx. In addition to transforming the health care journey through responsible AI/ML innovation, our charter also includes developing and supporting an enterprise AI/ML development platform.  

  

Optum AI team members:  

* Have impact at scale: We have the data and resources to make an impact at scale. When our solutions are deployed, they have the potential to make health care system work better for everyone.
* Do ground\-breaking work: Many of our current projects involve cutting edge ML, NLP and LLM techniques. Generative AI methods for working with structured and unstructured health care data are continuously being developed and improved. We are working in one of the most important frontiers of AI/ML research and development.
* Partner with world\-class experts on innovative solutions: Our team members are developing novel AI/ML solutions to business challenges. In some cases, this includes the opportunity to file patents and publish papers about the methods we develop. We also collaborate with AI/ML researchers at some of the world’s top universities.
  


**Primary Responsibilities:**


* Develop and deploy innovative AI solutions to various business problems. You will have the opportunity to learn and apply some of the most cutting\-edge AI technologies
* Research and evaluate new data sources, AI technology trends and methodologies to enhance Organization level data science capabilities and solutions
* Perform data analysis, pre\-processing and feature engineering required to ensure quality and reliability of the AI models and optimize them for performance and robustness
* Develop and deploy big data pipelines and frameworks for data ingestion, processing and analysis
* Comply with the terms and conditions of the employment contract, company policies and procedures, and any and all directives (such as, but not limited to, transfer and/or re\-assignment to different work locations, change in teams and/or work shifts, policies in regards to flexibility of work benefits and/or work environment, alternative work arrangements, and other decisions that may arise due to the changing business environment). The Company may adopt, vary or rescind these policies and directives in its absolute discretion and without any limitation (implied or otherwise) on its ability to do so

**Required Qualifications:**


* Bachelor's degree or higher in computer science or engineering with a focus on language processing. 6\+ years of overall experience
* 4\+ years of experience in AI, ML and/or NLP R\&D (with demonstrable impact preferred). This requirement maybe relaxed for candidates with a PhD
* Experience with both traditional machine learning algorithms and modern deep learning and generative AI models
* Proven good knowledge of and hands\-on skills with repository management and GPU use, and the ability to rapidly set up pipelines for testing new ideas
* Proficiency in Python, R, SQL and other programming languages for data analysis and modeling
* Proficiency with cloud development environments such as Azure, AWS, and GCP
* Proven excellent analytical and problem\-solving skills, including the ability to disaggregate issues, identify root causes and recommend solutions

jobTitle: Senior Director AI-ML Science and Engineering
description:
Optum AI is UnitedHealth Group’s enterprise AI team. We are AI/ML scientists and engineers with deep expertise in AI/ML engineering for health care. We develop AI/ML solutions for the highest impact opportunities across UnitedHealth Group businesses including UnitedHealthcare, Optum Financial, Optum Health, Optum Insight, and Optum Rx. In addition to transforming the health care journey through responsible AI/ML innovation, our charter also includes developing and supporting an enterprise AI/ML development platform.  

  

Optum AI team members:  

* Have impact at scale: We have the data and resources to make an impact at scale. When our solutions are deployed, they have the potential to make health care system work better for everyone.
* Do ground\-breaking work: Many of our current projects involve cutting edge ML, NLP and LLM techniques. Generative AI methods for working with structured and unstructured health care data are continuously being developed and improved. We are working in one of the most important frontiers of AI/ML research and development.
* Partner with world\-class experts on innovative solutions: Our team members are developing novel AI/ML solutions to business challenges. In some cases, this includes the opportunity to file patents and publish papers about the methods we develop. We also collaborate with AI/ML researchers at some of the world’s top universities.
  



Optum AI looking for a Senior Director of AI/ML Engineering to lead our team of talented engineers and scientists in developing cutting\-edge AI/ML solutions for various healthcare domains and applications leading our India team. You will be responsible for setting the vision, strategy, and roadmap for our AI/ML initiatives, as well as overseeing the design, development, and deployment of AI/ML models and systems. You will also collaborate with other senior leaders, stakeholders, and customers to ensure alignment and integration of AI/ML capabilities across the organization.

  


**Position in this function drives AI/ML Solution innovation and delivery for Optum AI India and own 1\-2 Wicked AI Problems.**



**Primary Responsibilities:**


* Develop and implement AI and machine learning strategies for several healthcare domains
* Lead AI teams and drive the development of innovative AI and machine learning solutions
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to identify and prioritize AI and machine learning initiatives
* Manage the development and deployment of AI and machine learning solutions
* Stay up\-to\-date with the latest AI and machine learning technologies and trends
* Develop and maintain Solid relationships with stakeholders, customers, and partners internally and externally
* Comply with the terms and conditions of the employment contract, company policies and procedures, and any and all directives (such as, but not limited to, transfer and/or re\-assignment to different work locations, change in teams and/or work shifts, policies in regards to flexibility of work benefits and/or work environment, alternative work arrangements, and other decisions that may arise due to the changing business environment). The Company may adopt, vary or rescind these policies and directives in its absolute discretion and without any limitation (implied or otherwise) on its ability to do so

**Required Qualifications:**


* Master's degree in computer science, engineering, mathematics, statistics, or a related discipline
* Minimum of 12 years of experience in Software Engineering, Data Science, or Analytics with at least 8 years of experience in AI/ML engineering or related fields
* Hands\-on experience in various AI/ML techniques, such as deep learning, natural language processing, recommender systems, reinforcement learning, large language models (LLM), etc.
* Experience with AI/ML frameworks and tools, such as MLFlow, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Scikit\-learn, etc.
* Experience with cloud platforms and services, such as AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.
* Experience with DevOps and CI/CD tools and practices, such as Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.
* Experience in working with cross\-functional and distributed teams in a global and diverse environment
* Experience in mentoring, coaching, and developing AI/ML talent
* Experience in establishing and enforcing AI/ML best practices, standards, and ethics
* Demonstrated experience in leading and managing AI/ML teams and projects, from ideation to delivery and evaluation
* Proficiency in Python, R, or other programming languages for data analysis and AI/ML development
* Proven excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to explain complex AI/ML concepts and results to technical and non\-technical audiences
* Proven solid analytical, problem\-solving, and decision\-making skills, with the ability to balance innovation and pragmatism
* Demonstrated passion for learning and staying updated with the latest AI/ML trends and research

  


**Preferred Qualifications:**


* PhD in computer science, engineering, mathematics, statistics, or a related discipline
* Background in Healthcare (AI)
* A proven track record of delivering high\-impact AI/ML solutions for real\-world problems and use cases
* A portfolio of AI/ML publications, patents, or awards

Learn more about our culture and how we make our employees happier through The Sprinklr Way.
Job Description
What Does Success Look Like
In your role as a Research Scientist, you will be tasked with creating innovative machine learning research for the next generation of digital customer experience applications.  

What You’ll Do* Work in collaboration with a multidisciplinary team of AI researchers with expertise in GenAI, computer vision, speech recognition, NLP, and related fields.
* Contribute to the development of the long\-term technical roadmap for AI research at the company.
* Conduct AI research using CXM data to innovate and potentially patent or publish findings, while clearly communicating progress and results both internally and externally through written and oral reports.
* Work closely with product development teams to integrate AI technologies into products and services.
* Partner with engineering leads to ensure seamless translation of research into practical and scalable AI applications.
* Work on publishing research papers and filing patents for Sprinklr AI innovations.

  

What Makes You Qualified* Candidates should hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computational Linguistics, or a related field, emphasizing AI, machine learning, computer vision, or speech processing, with a minimum of 4 years of relevant experience. Alternatively, a Master's degree with at least 3 years of experience is also considered.
* Strong publication record in top\-tier AI, ML, computer vision, or speech processing conferences and journals is a plus.
* Industry experience in ML, DS, AI research, with a focus on multimodal AI technologies.
* Proficiency in machine learning frameworks and programming languages relevant to AI, computer vision, and speech processing.
* Exceptional communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts to diverse audiences.

At Sprinklr, we have many of the world's largest brands as our clients, and our employees have the opportunity to work closely alongside them.
